tasks: {"sub_instruction": "Walk straight ahead, passing the black marble wall on your left and the patterned floor tiles beneath you, until you reach the wooden round table in the center of the room. Stop at the table, facing the green armchair to your right.", "sub_indexes": [0, 77], "revised_sub_instruction": "Stride confidently forward. As you do, the black marble wall will accompany you on your left side, and beneath your feet, the intricate dance of patterned tiles will guide your steps. Your journey halts at the heart of the room—a wooden round table—where you'll find yourself facing a cozy green armchair to your right."}

{"sum_instruction": "Stride confidently forward. As you do, the black marble wall will accompany you on your left side, and beneath your feet, the intricate dance of patterned tiles will guide your steps. Your journey halts at the heart of the room—a wooden round table—where you'll find yourself facing a cozy green armchair to your right.", "sum_indexes": [0, 77]}
